meanings.definition: A viral infection causing small painful blisters on the skin or mucous membranes, typically around the mouth or genitals.
meanings.sent1: After getting herpes, she had to be careful not to spread it to others.
meanings.sent2: He developed herpes after sharing a drink with someone who had a cold sore.
meanings.sent3: The herpes outbreak on his lip made him look like he had eaten a spicy pepper.
meanings.sent4: Herpes felt like tiny firecrackers going off on his skin.
meanings.sent5: The pain of herpes was a constant reminder of the importance of practicing safe hygiene.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of viral diseases caused by herpesviruses, affecting the skin or nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Doctors are researching new treatments for different types of herpes.
meanings.sent2: Herpesviruses can cause various symptoms depending on the specific type of herpes.
meanings.sent3: The idea of viruses like herpes running around inside you is quite unsettling.
meanings.sent4: The spread of gossip in the office was like a herpes outbreak, infecting everyone.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the different strains of herpes was like discovering a hidden world of tiny invaders.
